abstract: Eric Pek, one of three teenagers who slipped out of Brooklyn group home operated by Boys Town and committed rape, robbery and burglary in Manhattan's Chinatown, is sentenced to 14 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Eric Pek, 17, was one of three youths who had pleaded guilty to rape, robbery and burglary in the attack in June after they had slipped out of a group home.

headline.main: Teenager Sentenced to 14 Years in Chinatown Rape
headline.print_headline: Youth Sentenced to 14-Year Term for a 2015 Rape in Chinatown

snippet: Eric Pek, 17, was one of three youths who had pleaded guilty to rape, robbery and burglary in the attack in June after they had slipped out of a group home.
